name: Feature Identity
summary: This feature improves the prioritization of UEs in idle state based on the paging

parameters.name: PrefUeGroupSelectionProfile.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: The  variable can be used to                                     configure paging priority as a selection criteria for UE                                     Admission Control Function 2.

parameters.name: UeAdmissionGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: The  variable can be used to                                     configure paging priority as a selection criteria for UE                                     Admission Control Function 2.

parameters.name: UeGroupSelectionProfile.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: The  variable can be used to                                     configure paging priority as a selection criteria for UE                                     Admission Control Function 2.

parameters.name: UeMobilityGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: The  variable can be used to                                     configure paging priority as a selection criteria for UE                                     Admission Control Function 2.

parameters.name: UeServiceGroupDefinition.selectionCriteria
parameters.description: The  variable can be used to                                     configure paging priority as a selection criteria for UE                                     Admission Control Function 2.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012781 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012781 MO instance.
